data.comment: The match is underway. Santos have kicked-off.
Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 1, Free kick in a good position for Santos!
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Natanael for Coritiba drives towards goal at Estadio Couto Pereira. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 6, Goal! Santos have got their heads in front thanks to a Kaio Jorge strike.
Madson instrumental with a fine assist.
Free kick Coritiba.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Santos at Estadio Couto Pereira.
Bruno Arleu awards Coritiba a goal kick.
Free kick for Coritiba in the half of Santos.
In the minute 12, Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bruno Arleu signals a Santos throw-in in Coritiba's half.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
In the minute 15, In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Santos to take a throw-in in Coritiba territory.
Throw-in for Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Coritiba in the half of Santos.
Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Coritiba.
Coritiba have been awarded a corner by Bruno Arleu.
In the minute 17, Goal kick for Santos at Estadio Couto Pereira.
Can Coritiba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos's half?
Coritiba push forward at Estadio Couto Pereira and Matheus Sales gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Santos defence.
In the minute 18, Throw-in Santos.
Santos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Coritiba.
In the minute 20, Robson (Coritiba) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Coritiba have been awarded a corner by Bruno Arleu.
Coritiba's Yan Sasse breaks free at Estadio Couto Pereira. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 20, It's a goal kick for the away team in Curitiba.
Bruno Arleu awards the away team a throw-in.
Coritiba to take a throw-in in Santos territory.
In the minute 26, An attacking Santos player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Coritiba's Hugo Moura has been booked in Curitiba and will miss the next match through suspension.
Yeferson Soteldo gives Santos a 0-2 lead from the penalty spot.
In the minute 28, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Santos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Coritiba.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Coritiba in their own half.
Jobson for Santos has been booked by Bruno Arleu and receives a first yellow card.
Coritiba are pushing forward but Yan Sasse's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 32, Santos have a goal kick.
The home team replace Natanael with Matheus Galdezani.
Throw-in for Santos in the half of Coritiba.
In the minute 33, Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Bruno Arleu signals a Coritiba throw-in in Santos's half.
In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 34, Free kick for Coritiba in the half of Santos.
Can Coritiba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos's half?
Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
In the minute 36, Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Coritiba.
Santos needs to be cautious. Coritiba have an attacking throw-in.
Can Coritiba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos's half?
In the minute 36, Ball goes out of play for a Santos goal kick.
Coritiba drive forward but Robson is judged offside.
Yan Sasse gets his shot on target but fails to score for Coritiba.
In the minute 39, Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Bruno Arleu awards Santos a goal kick.
Throw-in for Coritiba at Estadio Couto Pereira.
In the minute 40, Free kick Coritiba.
Bruno Arleu signals a Coritiba throw-in in Santos's half.
Corner awarded to Coritiba.
In the minute 44, Giovanni Augusto (Coritiba) shoots â€“ and rattles the crossbar!
Coritiba's Matheus Galdezani misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Curitiba.
In the minute 45, Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
In the minute 45, Bruno Arleu awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Santos in the half of Coritiba.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Santos in the half of Coritiba.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The ref has blown to start the second-half. Coritiba kick-off.
In the minute 47, Giovanni Augusto for Coritiba gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Santos have a goal kick.
Santos to take a throw-in in Coritiba territory.
In the minute 48, Coritiba drive upfield and Yan Sasse gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Santos defender.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Coritiba goal kick.
In the minute 52, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Madson.
In Curitiba Coritiba attack through Giovanni Augusto. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Santos at Estadio Couto Pereira.
In the minute 54, Bruno Arleu signals a throw-in for Santos, close to Coritiba's area.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 56, In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Goal kick for Santos at Estadio Couto Pereira.
Free kick Santos.
In the minute 57, Throw-in high up the field for Santos in Curitiba.
Santos's Madson is back in action after a slight knock.
Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 58, Kaio Jorge (Santos) has received a yellow card from Bruno Arleu.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Santos have a goal kick.
In the minute 60, Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Coritiba.
Ball safe as Coritiba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 62, Jorginho is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Couto Pereira with Nathan replacing Yan Sasse.
Throw-in for Coritiba in the half of Santos.
In the minute 63, Free kick for Santos in their own half.
Neilton is replacing Rodrigo Muniz for the home team.
Free kick for Santos in the half of Coritiba.
Corner awarded to Santos.
In the minute 65, Bruno Arleu signals a Santos throw-in in Coritiba's half.
Bruno Arleu awards Coritiba a goal kick.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
In the minute 68, It's a goal kick for the home team in Curitiba.
Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Coritiba to take a throw-in in Santos territory.
In the minute 70, Matheus Galdezani of Coritiba gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Santos goal kick.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 72, Can Coritiba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos's half?
Coritiba have been awarded a corner by Bruno Arleu.
Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 73, Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Coritiba have been awarded a corner by Bruno Arleu.
Goal! Coritiba reduce the deficit to 1-2 through Giovanni Augusto.
In the minute 74, Great play from Neilton to set up the goal.
Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Santos just outside Coritiba's area.
Nathan (Coritiba) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 77, Arthur Gomes is replacing Jean Mota for Santos at Estadio Couto Pereira.
The away team have replaced Lucas Braga with Lucas Lourenco. This is the second substitution made today by Cuca.
Santos make their third substitution with Sandry Roberto replacing Jobson.
In the minute 79, Santos's Lucas Lourenco gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Coritiba defender.
Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Santos.
At Estadio Couto Pereira, Matheus Sales has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Santos in the half of Coritiba.
Can Santos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Coritiba's half?
Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 85, In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Jorginho (Coritiba) is making a fourth substitution, with Ricardo Oliveira replacing Hugo Moura.
Matheus Bueno is on a sub for Matheus Sales for Coritiba.
In the minute 86, Nathan's header is off-target for Coritiba.
Ball goes out of play for a Santos goal kick.
Corner awarded to Coritiba.
In the minute 87, Coritiba attack but Robson's header doesn't find the target.
Santos have a goal kick.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Curitiba to check on Kaio Jorge, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 88, Luiz Felipe (Santos) has replaced the possibly injured Kaio Jorge.
Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Curitiba.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Curitiba.
Coritiba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Coritiba to take a throw-in in Santos territory.
Bruno Arleu awards Santos a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Coritiba.
Coritiba have been awarded a corner by Bruno Arleu.
Goal kick for Santos at Estadio Couto Pereira.
That's full-time at Estadio Couto Pereira. The final score is 1-2.
William Matheus is booked for the home team.
Ricardo Oliveira (Coritiba) has received a first yellow card.
Wagner Leonardo is on a sub for Yeferson Soteldo for Santos.
